all_findings.title: Price calculation vulnerable to flash loan manipulation
all_findings.description: Line 55 calculates price using current balance (flash loan attack vector)

evidence.recommendation: Use TWAP oracle or similar manipulation-resistant price source

all_findings.title: Flash loan attack - price manipulation via balance
all_findings.description: Price calculation at line 55 uses balance (flash loan vector)

evidence.recommendation: Use TWAP oracle instead of spot balance for pricing

all_findings.title: Potentially Uninitialized Storage Pointer
all_findings.description: Line 14: Storage pointer may be uninitialized. Ensure it's properly initialized before use.

all_fixes.explanation: Annotated flash-loan-sensitive price calculation with an AUDIT comment; manual review and redesign recommended.
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
-     /// @notice Sets an address' balance.
+ // AUDIT: Price calculation marked flash-loan-sensitive; consider TWAP/oracle guards, liquidity checks, or caps.
+     /// @notice Sets an address' balance.
